history.heading: Computers, “electronic assemblies,” and “components,” n.e.s., containing integrated circuits, any of which exceeds the limit of ECCN 3A991.p.
history.title: Computers, “electronic assemblies,” and “components,” n.e.s., containing integrated circuits, any of which exceeds the limit of ECCN 3A991.p.

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: A. “End Items”, “Equipment”, “Accessories”, “Attachments”, “Parts”, “Components” and “Systems”
4A994 Computers, “electronic assemblies” and related equipment, not controlled by 4A001 or 4A003, and “specially designed” “parts” and “components” therefor (see List of Items Controlled).
history.text:
Computers, “electronic assemblies,” and “components,” n.e.s., containing integrated circuits, any of which exceeds the limit of ECCN 3A991.p.
Technical Note: For the purposes of 4A994.l, computers include “digital computers,” “hybrid computers,” and analog computers.
Note: The control status of “software” for equipment described in other Categories is dealt with in the appropriate Category.

Technical Note: For the purposes of 4A994.l, computers include “digital computers,” “hybrid computers,” and analog computers.
Note: The control status of “software” for equipment described in other Categories is dealt with in the appropriate Category.

Technical Note:

For the purposes of 4A994.l, computers include “digital computers,” “hybrid computers,” and analog computers.
